longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 
 - Emergency and temporary passports must be valid for a
   minimum of 6 months from the arrival date. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a Driver's Licence, Voter's Registration Card,
  Social Security Card or National ID Card (SEE NOTE 12451):
    NOTE 12451: Identification cards must
   
 - those residing in Montserrat, who otherwise will be issued
   British passports endorsed  British Overseas Territories
   Citizen  or  British Overseas Citizen .
- Holders of emergency and temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 6 months: 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Territories Citizen  or  British Overseas Citizen  issued
   to residents of Montserrat;
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months:
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British
   Citizen ,  British Overseas Territories Citizen ,  British
   National (Overseas) ,  British Overseas Citizen ,  British
   Protected Person  or  British Subject ;
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
Warning:
- Nationals of Falkland Isl. (Malvinas) who have visited
  Guinea, Liberia, Nigeria or Sierra Leone within the last 21
  days will be refused entry. 



 St
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
